enWisdom: One who gives you sincere advice has shown concern for you

Wisdom: مَنْ تَاجَرَكَ بِالنُّصْحِ فَقَدْ أَجْزَلَ لَكَ الرِّبْحَ
enWisdom: One who trades with you by [giving you] advice has indeed made your profit abound

Wisdom: مَنْ تَاجَرَكَ فِي النُّصْحِ كَانَ شَرِيكَكَ فِي الرِّبْحِ
enWisdom: One who trades with you in advice is your partner in profit

Wisdom: مَا أَخْلَصَ الْمَوَدَّةَ مَنْ لَمْ يَنْصَحْ
enWisdom: One who does not give good advice is not sincere in his friendship

Wisdom: مَا أَلَاكَ جُهْداً فِي النَّصِيحَةِ مَنْ دَلَّكَ عَلَى عَيْبِكَ وَحَفِظَ غَيْبَكَ
enWisdom: He who points you to your faults and guards [your honour in] your absence has spared no efforts in advising you

Wisdom: مُنَاصِحُكَ مُشْفِقٌ عَلَيْكَ مُحْسِنٌ إِلَيْكَ نَاظِرٌ فِي عَوَاقِبِكَ مُسْتَدْرِكٌ فَوَارِطَكَ فَفِي طَاعَتِهِ رَشَادُكَ وَفِي مُخَالَفَتِهِ فَسَادُكَ
enWisdom: Your sincere adviser is concerned about you, shows kindness to you, considers your outcomes and rectifies of your shortcomings; so in obedience to him lies your development and in opposition to him, your corruption
There is no admonisher more effective than sincere advice
